instructions.reason_for_call: You want to exchange your Bicycle to a larger frame size for your kid. If the agent asks for confirmation, mention that you'd prefer the other card as payment or refund method. Lastly, you want to cancel the skateboard in your other order.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to exchange a few items from my recent orders. Specifically, I want to exchange a bicycle for a larger frame size for my kid. Also, I want to exchange a jigsaw puzzle from the same order to one with the same difficulty but with 1000 more pieces. If possible, I prefer an animal theme over an art theme for the puzzle. Additionally, I want to exchange a camera to a slightly lower resolution model without changing the other options. Lastly, I want to cancel the skateboard in my other order. Can you help me with these requests?
